akn:content.akn:p: §§ 2931, 2932. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Sections were omitted in the general amendment of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, Pub. L. 89–10, by Pub. L. 103–382, title I, § 101, Oct. 20, 1994, 108 Stat. 3519. Section 2931, Pub. L. 89–10, title I, § 1521, as added Pub. L. 100–297, title I, § 1001, Apr. 28, 1988, 102 Stat. 206, related to State uses of funds. Section 2932, Pub. L. 89–10, title I, § 1522, as added Pub. L. 100–297, title I, § 1001, Apr. 28, 1988, 102 Stat. 206, related to State applications.
